Objective.Name: Human
Objective.Details: Fight Humans:\Versatile masters of offense\Favor highly efficient, flexible ground forces\ \Difficult opponent

Objective.Name: Grekim
Objective.Details: Fight Grekim:\Devious masters of time travel\Rely on self-chronoportation and air power\ \Intermediate opponent

Objective.Name: Fight Vecgir
Objective.Details: Fight Vecgir:\Insular masters of teleportation\Exploit hypermobile self-teleporting vehicles\Powerful defensive structures and abilities\Easy opponent
